Learn More About Our Community Initiatives A great neighborhood eatery, for dine-in or takeout. Reasonable prices, good beers and a fun atmosphere to enjoy good food and company. Chris Always excellent food and service!! Ordered to go over 15 times since Iâ€™ve lived in Mt. Pleasant, and everything Iâ€™m impressed and satisfied. Definitely a place to go to if you want some good food! Michael This was my first time trying this place and lord knows I really enjoyed it. The wings are phenomenal and the customer service was beyond amazing! I highly recommend this place â¤ï¸ Lakia Delicious food, Great Service and friendly atmosphere. Traditional gastropub food served was very fresh and yummy. I recommend the wings and fish n chips. Justin Great pub style, friendly restaurant. Highly recommend for a â€˜cheersieâ€™ good time!! Marika Had Roast Beef au jus and meat was a nice med with a bit of pink, real tender. We went on Friday night so place was jamming. We found a seat outside which was perfect. Weâ€™ll definitely be back!!! GB Good friendly service and fun atmosphere great vibes and great food Will definitely recommend this place to all groups of people Elliot Tasty hot dog. The â€œDon Knottsâ€ Chili, Slaw and I added some diced onions. Piping hot fries. Service was super! Shawn Cozy local feel, great food! Lots of beverage choices for all. Food Menu littledog 2025-10-10T15:05:03-04:00 Order online from BELLE HALL Order online from PARK WEST Order online from CLEMENTS FERRY Order online from MONCKS CORNER We only accept take-out orders through the online ordering pages on this site or if you walk in. We do not accept phone orders. Munchies BASKET OF FRIES $5.79 BASKET OF SUPER JOJOS $5.89 NASHVILLE HOT FRIES $7.19 Crispy skin-on fries tossed in housemade Nashville Hot Sauce BASKET OF BEER-BATTERED ONION RINGS $7.99 GERMAN JOJOS $10.69 Seasoned potato wedges(JoJos) chopped & topped with Hickory-smoked bacon, melted Colby-Jack cheese and chopped chives served with ranch or sour cream.
